00111|   const maxTokens = getAdaptiveMaxTokens(cleanedText)
00112|   
00113|   console.log(`Translating: "${cleanedText.substring(0, 50)}" ${sourceLang}→${targetLang} (max_tokens: ${maxTokens})`)
00114|   
00115|   try {
00116|     const controller = new AbortController()
00117|     const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
00118|       console.log('API request timeout, aborting...')
00119|       controller.abort()
00120|     }, 8000) // 8 second timeout - faster failure for better UX
00121|     
00122|     const response = await fetch('https://dashscope-intl.aliyuncs.com/compatible-mode/v1/chat/completions', {
00123|       method: 'POST',
00124|       headers: {
00125|         'Authorization': `Bearer ${DASHSCOPE_API_KEY}`,
00126|         'Content-Type': 'application/json',
00127|       },
00128|       body: JSON.stringify({
00129|         model: 'qwen-mt-turbo',
00130|         messages: [
00131|           {
00132|             role: 'user',
00133|             content: `Translate from ${LANGUAGE_NAMES[sourceLang] || sourceLang} to ${LANGUAGE_NAMES[targetLang] || targetLang}:\n${cleanedText}`
00134|           }
00135|         ],
00136|         max_tokens: maxTokens,
00137|         temperature: 0.1
00138|       }),
00139|       signal: controller.signal
00140|     })
00141|     
00142|     clearTimeout(timeoutId)
00143|     
00144|     console.log('qwen-mt-turbo response status:', response.status)
00145|     
00146|     if (!response.ok) {
00147|       throw new Error(`API request failed: ${response.status}`)
00148|     }
00149| 
00150|     const data = await response.json()
